mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_execution_log (task_id, project_id, device_id, planned_time, execute_time, duration_ms, result, message) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{projectId}, #{deviceId}, #{plannedTime}, #{executeTime}, #{durationMs}, #{result}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(execute_time) AS lastExecuteTime, COUNT(*) AS totalRuns FROM task_execution_log WHERE task_id = #{taskId}

choose.when: SELECT STR_TO_DATE( DATE_FORMAT(t.execute_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS day, COUNT(*) AS runs FROM task_execution_log t WHERE t.task_id = #{taskId} AND t.execute_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY STR_TO_DATE( DATE_FORMAT(t.execute_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) ORDER BY day
choose.otherwise: SELECT DATE(t.execute_time) AS day, COUNT(*) AS runs FROM task_execution_log t WHERE t.task_id = #{taskId} AND t.execute_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY DATE(t.execute_time) ORDER BY day

mapper.select: SELECT execute_time, duration_ms, attempt, result, message FROM task_execution_log WHERE task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY execute_time DESC
